Detailed Description

Service for Random Pose.

ROS Node Name
  • random_position_server
Authors
Carmine Tommaso Recchiuto, Francesco Ganci (S4143910)
Version
v1.0

Description:

The service can return a (x, y) position randomly generated using bounds specified in the request.

The service can generate also an angle around Z axis, already noramlized in [-pi, pi].

Services:

  • /position_server : RandomPosition.srv
    Ask for a new random plane position (with bounds) and orientation about Z axis (no bounds, normalized).

Definition in file position_service.cpp.

◆ main()

int main ( int  argc,
char **  argv 
)

ROS node main - position_service.cpp.

A trivial main function: init the node, advertise the service, then spin. NO OUTPUT on the screen is provided.
